title: Blocker Gundan IV Machine Blaster
synopsis: The peace of the world is suddenly threatened by Mogool, which is located on the bottom of the sea. Helqeen, tyrannical master of the Mogoolian Empire, attempts to conquer the earth with her faithful companions Goroskie and Zan-gack.
staff: [['Bessho, Takaharu', ['Producer']], ['Annou, Masami', ['Director']], ['Endou, Masaharu', ['Episode Director']], ['Yamauchi, Shigeyasu', ['Production Assistant']]]
